snippet: The Yankees think they know what they are getting in Hiroki Kuroda, who established himself by going 41-46 with a 3.45 E.R.A. in four seasons with the Dodgers.
abstract: New York Yankees think they know what they are getting in free agent pitcher Hiroki Kuroda, who has established himself by going 41-46 with a 3.45 E.R.A. in four seasons with the Los Angeles Dodgers; are confident that they finally have the determined competitor with a four-pitch repertory they have coveted for so long.
lead_paragraph: The Yankees think they know what they are getting in Hiroki Kuroda, who established himself by going 41-46 with a 3.45 E.R.A. in four seasons with the Dodgers.

headline.seo: Little Mystery Surrounding Yankees’ Latest Japanese Pitcher
headline.main: A Japanese Pitcher Without the Mystery
